title: Flight Simulator 2020 - How to - Airbus H135 helicopter - Set flight plan manually
description:
In this how to we are going to look how we can configure our flight plan manually in our navigation system from our  Airbus H135 helicopter. Setting up the flight plan will also include using an SID and STAR as bonus.

Route being configure will be from Courchevel Altiport (LFLJ) to Cmabery Aix-les-Bans (LFLB) initially. 

If you also want to give the helicopter a try download the  Airbus H135 from the site below:
https://flightsim.to/discover/helicopter
